bgDescription: A special product that combines potions of different potencies, which may provide a variety of unexpected benefits.
description: Used to grant selected Resonators immunity to a fatal damage and heal 25% of the Resonator's Max HP, lasting for 60s. (This effect only applies to your own Resonator(s) in Co-op Mode)
obtainDescription: Used to grant selected Resonators immunity to a fatal damage and heal 25% of the Resonator's Max HP, lasting for 60s. (This effect only applies to your own Resonator(s) in Co-op Mode)
